an10.40:1: "‘Saṅghasāmaggī, saṅghasāmaggī’ti, bhante, vuccati. Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, saṅgho samaggo hotī"ti?
an10.40:2: "Bhinnaṁ pana, bhante, saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ katvā kiṁ so pasavatī"ti?
an10.40:3: Sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggī,samaggānañca anuggaho;Samaggarato dhammaṭṭho,yogakkhemā na dhaṁsati;Saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ katvāna,kappaṁ saggamhi modatī"ti.
an10.40:4: Upāli ṭhapanā ubbāho,upasampadanissayā;Sāmaṇero ca dve bhedā,ānandehi pare duveti.
